reviews.title: Like
reviews.comment: The game is really fun and challenging I love the game and it is very very fun useful and very very certainly fun and challenging and funny.
reviews.author: David Williams

reviews.title: Grandma
reviews.comment: I really like this because it really helps exercise the brain. When I get stumped I can come back to it later and try again. Sometimes I think of the answer when I am doing something else so you can tell your brain is still thinking even when you are not playing

reviews.title: 4 pic 1 word
reviews.comment: a great game, very addictive & great to keep your mind occupied when you need to relax

reviews.title: Good

reviews.title: Good game.
reviews.comment: If you prefer addictive and brain solving games, then this is a game for you. I\'ve completed the first What\'s The Word, and this version is even better and harder!
